oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-11-01 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 1, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hawkshaw Hawkins (host/performer), guest performers Johnnie & Jack, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 995th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hawkshaw Hawkins; Jordanaires; Johnnie & Jack; Tommy Jackson; Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Hawkshaw Hawkins -- I'll Get Even With You (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces the Jordanaires -- My Good Fortune (Jordanaires) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Johnnie & Jack -- Lonely Island Pearl (Johnnie & Jack) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Tommy Jackson -- Tennessee Wagoner (Tommy Jackson fiddle) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins talks -- An Empty Mansion (Hawkshaw Hawkins, Jordanaires) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Chet Atkins -- Walkin' The Strings (Chet Atkins) -- Hawkshaw Hawkins introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Turner, Grant; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963
